#summary Documentation of the Rend_Factory_Auth class.

= Description =
This factory simply wraps the singleton method in [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.auth.html Zend_Auth].

= Configuration =
This factory has no configuration settings.

= Usage =
{{{
class MyController extends Rend_Controller_Action {
    public function myAction() {
        $auth = $this->_factory->auth;
        if (!$auth->hasIdentity()) {
            die('You must be authenticated before you can access this page');
        }
    }
}
}}}
